alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Grady; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Comanche, southwestern Grady, southeastern Caddo and northwestern Stephens Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 6 miles southeast of Sterling, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Marlow, Rush Springs, Sterling, Verden, Cement, Norge, Agawam, Tabler, Lake Chickasha, Central High, Ninnekah, Acme, and Laverty. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 64 and 85. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
